metadata.title: Perform immunofluorescence analysis for HA tag and lineage markers at day 24

annotations.description: On day 24, immunofluorescence analysis revealed HA-tag+ SMCs and fibroblasts but also CMs (Fig. 5b, Supplementary Video 3 and Extended Data Fig. 9c), supporting the fate potentiality previously inferred from gene expression (Fig. 1h,i).
